column1: * 1936 - In his Preface to Roman Britain and the English Settlements
column2: R.G. Collingwood on this date writes about J.R.R. Tolkiens contribution to the book.

* 1956 - Tolkien writes a Letter to Peter Alford (14 January 1956).
* 1973 - Reader N.J. Kyle writes Letter to N.J. Kyle.
* 2005 - The first "The One Ring Celebration" starts.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings: The Ultimate Critical Review is released.
**  The Fellowship of the Ring travel through Moria from mid-morning to evening. They spend the night in Twenty-first Hall.
